channel.title: Sick of these hackers!
channel.description:
OMG I CANT STAND IT! MY server is getting way to many Hackers in it people are spawning phats! ITS DRIVING ME CRAZY! My server finally got up to 55 people and I was excited and ONE guy comes in and spawns phats and says give me 3 million or im going to crash your server.
and bam my servers down and once i put it back up i lost all my users are gone.
Im so mad and theres nothing I can do about it because the guys user accout didn't even show up in chars so I cant delete his account or anything!
Help!

item.title: Sick of these hackers!
item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

Lol ipban doesn’t work and SYI doesn’t have a cheat client it is a program that sends alot of nulls at like 1000 per second and you can change the name mr.quarter realeased it on rune-server so people on moparscape couldn’t see it because he posted a thread that he wanted to stop them.

Read full topic

ip ban…

item.title: Sick of these hackers!
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

I believe the spamming phats is a bug in your useItemOnPlayer.

lets say someone cracks a cracker on someone they don’t have or something it will still work and give u a party hat, need to add more inventory checks to handling the packet

item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

Because mscp pservers are so unstable…maybe stable it up a bit? l2somejava? program a few anti hacks?..tbh it’s not that hard to “hack” and spawn phats…rofl…all you need is a shit server to mess around in, i love to go around and fuck up a nooby tutscape server’s “economy”, and have all 7 players go into a mass histaria…

item.title: Sick of these hackers!
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

There will always be loop holes. All servers can be crashed, even runescape. Just get an anti null, and hope for the best.

[quote=“archerkill30, post:15, topic:149039”]I quit runescape private servers! It happened again! I can understand why people hack in real runescape but in a runescape private server! its just sad.

Get_phat(?) if your reading this message guess what YOU WIN.

PS. theres No “loop holes” in my source ive coded almost all of it from scratch I know my server bottom from top all commands everything! Im no noob ive worked with one source for a LONG time.[/quote]

You cant say you coded a server from scratch if you dont even have an anti null or anti cheat.

Read full topic

item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

[quote=“Alphaspida, post:2, topic:149039”]lol find his/her ip and call the cops rOfL[/quote] Lmao stop spamming the forums with useless stuff.

Are they getting free admin or just crashing your server because if there getting free admin open client.java and search for “start of mod” then erase all the names because that gives people free admins.
And if there server crashers look on rune-server or moparscape for anti server crashing guides i dont feel like explaing it all right now.

item.title: Sick of these hackers!
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

[quote=“aftereffect, post:1, topic:149044”]See if you knew a little java you could fix this easily, but being the nice guy i am ill help you out :).

Theres 2 things to stop nulls: Id 14 and Bakatools way.
Id 14:
Open client.java and search for if(inStream.readUnsignedByte() != 14) { Replace that if statement with this, if(inStream.readUnsignedByte() != 14) { disconnected = true; PlayerHandler.players[playerId] = null; return; }
Bakatools way:
Go into PlayerHandler.java and add this in the do while statement, else if(players[i].disconnected || players[i].playerName == null) { //System.out.println("[debug dc] " + i + " is null reused check"); slot = i; break; } To stop setiteming, open client.java and search for case 237. Under those variables add this if((playerItems[castOnSlot] - 1)!=castOnItem){ castOnItem = -1; alchvaluez = 0; castSpell = 0; } [/quote]

Neither of those work, or will do anything to stop people spawning party hats.

Read full topic
